Reviews.Title: Disappointed in picture quality
Reviews.Author: ABIODUN OKULAJA
Reviews.Content: Disappointed in the picture quality, they need to make it more better. Need wait few seconds to take quality picture and forget about quality while in motion.

Reviews.Title: Don't think I will buy it again
Reviews.Author: Mauricio Martinez
Reviews.Content: If I had to choose again, I would not buy this phone. Then again, I don't know what phone to buy, all have pros and cons. My 9780 was way too old, so this was definely an upgraded.Good review for the seller, everything arrived as promised
